name: Writing Business Plan (by ChatGPT)
description: We're living in strange times.A.I. has completely changed the way we do business. And, in some cases can even do business for you.This free Notion template/PDF offers a complete business plan to begin selling the rights to your blog posts (or Medium articles) while retaining full ownership.
